actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

official_title: Designating a National Railroad Memorial located in Diamond District Park in historic downtown Durand, Michigan, as the "National Railroad Memorial".

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the National Railroad Museum located in Diamond District Park in historic downtown Durand, Michigan, be designated as the National Railroad Memorial.

titles.title: Designating a National Railroad Memorial located in Diamond District Park in historic downtown Durand, Michigan, as the "National Railroad Memorial".
